constituent: pavilion, tall, top hat, mouth, crown, street, nail, spike
heisigStory: Think of all the pavilions at County Fairs or World Expos you have wandered into or seen advertised in the media, and you will no doubt see rising up among them the towering tall crowned nail (the crown being a revolving restaurant) - that architectural monstrosity that has become a symbol of science and technology at such events.
koohiiStory1: The Pavillion on crown street is the tallest I have ever seen.
koohiiStory2: The tallest Pavilion crowns the street.
myStory: lối đi có mái. người đội mũ nồi đi dưới phố có mái che
